# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $80. However, to make this opportunity accessible to you, I'm offering it for $95. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also includes a limited-time discount for early adopters like yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits of our product at an exclusive rate. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
